ygData.subject: off-hand items for 1hblunt weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I use either the bloodforge hammer, or my SSOL and a Shiny Brass Shield (you can get the SBS off the trainer in Crushbone).  It s fairly difficult to get (mine
ygData.messageBody:
I use either the bloodforge hammer, or my SSOL and a Shiny Brass
Shield (you can get the SBS off the trainer in Crushbone). It's
fairly difficult to get (mine was given to me), but you could probably
buy one. It does weigh a fair bit, but gives +10 vs. magic. Other
than a shield, I'm not sure what you can hold in an off-hand. Besides
a light source such as a lantern. :)

>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>
>Quick question...
>
>I am going away from the Bloodforge to the SSOL, so what is a good item
>to hold along with the one handed weapon? I play a casting cleric so I
>am almost maxed out on weight and thus I don't want a shield. I do not
>want to hold the skull, or any other such evil item, since I am of
>purely good alignment. I can't really think of anything else that a
>level 16 can have. I have about a 100pp to buy the item if i can't go
>get it myself, or with one of my groups. Any suggestions would be most
>appreciated.
>
>Thank you!
>
>Eylena 16th circle Rodcet Nife
>
>
>
>--- Curtis Bennett <die_kluge@...> wrote:
> > From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
> >
> > Giving bone chips to Lushun Novashine works, but the
> > faction gained
> > is very slight. The blessed oil quest, while slow
> > and tedious, is
> > free and does seem to raise it much more.
> > There is also another quest, where you can kill
> > the monk standing
> > by the tree. Occasionally, you'll see Estle
> > attacking him. Forget
> > his name. I never did kill him, but he is a traitor
> > to Rodcet and
> > converted to Bertoxxulous. I suspect killing him
> > will raise faction
> > with priestoflife, too.
> > Say to the priest (Aeston Wemore) "I will be
> > traveling afar" if he
> > says he can not trust you, or whatever, you can't do
> > it. And you're
> > right, amiable is not good enough. After I made
> > amiable I had to do
> > the blessed oil quest about 3 more times. So,
> > somewhere between
> > amiable and warmly (or is it kindly?)
> > The halflings name in Rivervale is Kizzie Montopp
> > and she is just
> > to the left, coming out of Fool's guild in an herb
> > shop. I was
> > actually 'dubious' to her, and despite her threats
> > of calling the
> > guards on me, she still gave me the honeyjum.
> >
> > Also, a quick note on the bloodforge hammer, you
> > do not have to
> > have done ANY quests for Byzar (is that his name?)
> > Bloodforge in the
> > warrior's guild in Kaladim. I had never met the
> > guy, was amiable
> > anyway (because of killing so many Crushbone orcs)
> > and gave him
> > Trumpy's head, and he gave me the hammer. It's a
> > dirt simple quest,
> > just kill one guy, give him the head. It's just
> > that it's on the
> > other side of the world. And the head is nodrop, I
> > believe, so you
> > have to do it yourself.
